inn1.comm: good ball first up on the off stump line, a tentative push from Masakadza and a thickish edge along the ground to backward point.
good ball coming in and Masakadza defends to the onside to short midwicket.
good length delivery and Masakadza defends to short cover.
on the middle and leg and Masakadza works it to long leg for a single.
pushes to the off side.
good length delivery and Taylor plays with soft hands to mid-on and takes off for a quick single.
comes forward and defends with a straight bat down the track.
comes forward and defends square of the wicket on the off side.
cuts and misses outside the off stump.
takes the pad as he looks to turn it to the onside, was going down the leg side.
flat and quicker on the stumps, punches it to extra cover.
tossed up bit wide outside the off stump, left alone.
comes down the wicket and heaves it around forward of square leg but picks out the fielder.
down the track and this time drives down the ground to long off fence, wants to take full toll of the pace bowlers, not many in the team for today.
pushes to mid-on.
punches off the back foot to mid-off.
lovely shot, makes room and strikes well through cover, wonderful horizontal bat shot.
slower delivery from back of the hand and Masakadza has to wait for the ball and then pushes back to the bowler.
comes forward and drives down the ground to long off.
pushes to cover.
uses his feet and mistimes it back to the bowler.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
down the wicket and hoicks it over midwicket and to the fence.
uses his feet well and this time all along the ground through midwicket and to the fence.
drives to mid-on.
good length delivery defended back to the bowler.
works to the onside to short midwicket.
punches hard on the front foot to mid-off.
moves forward and drives to the right of cover, Naeem does well moving quickly.

short and wide outside the off stump and Taylor gives his all and looks to cut through the off side, gets the edge and through to Rahim behind the wicket, Bangladesh have the first breakthrough in Taylor.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
comes forward and defends to short cover.
driven to mid-off for a quick single.
hit in the air past the bowler and to the long on fence for a boundary. It was in the slot for Coventry.
moves into line and lofts the ball to wide long on fence for the second boundary.
inside edges to the off side.
edges into the pad and to the off side.
down the leg side, sweeps and misses.
turn and bounce and an outside edge to third man.
pushed to the off side and Razzak moves across to field.
moves forward and drives to short  cover.
moves back and cuts hard to cover.
lovely shot from Masakadza, drives on the front foot wide of long off to the fence.
a long hop and Masakadza rocks on the back foot and heaves it over the midwicket fence for maximum.
moves back and drives back to the bowler.
off the pad and to square leg, they go through for a leg bye.
comes forward and defends to short cover.
driven along the ground to mid-off.
plays it back to the bowler.
on the off and middle, pushed to short cover.
down the wicket and hits it well, drives in the air in the gap between the bowler and mid-off to the fence.
makes room and drives down the ground to wide long on.
uses his feet and looks to heave it through the onside, mistimes to short midwicket.
was looking for the big shot but then checks his shot and plays to mid-on, the fielders have a chuckle after Coventry changed his mind on the shot.
defends down the track.
works it to midwicket.
moves back and whips it through midwicket for his 8th boundary.
picks up the long hop and Masakadza is dismissing the balls to the fence, this time in the air and again to midwicket fence.
makes room and drives to mid-off.
uses his feet well and picks the gap once again, chips it in the air and to the midwicket fence for the third boundary in the over, good counter attack from Masakadza against the spinners.
pulls in the air wide of long on for a single.
lovely shot off the back foot, punches it down the track and past the bowler to long on fence, brings up his 50 in style, wonderful batting, well played.
pushes to the off side to cover.
drives to wide mid-on for a single.
drives well down the ground to long off.
plays and misses, that was a good ball, off the pad and behind the wicket.
missed stumping! Haque draws Coventry out of the crease and Rahim lets go of a stumping chance and concedes a bye
pushed to midwicket
leg stump line as Masakadza pushes it to mid-on for a single
tossed on the leg stump. Coventry pushes it to deep midwicket for a single
on the leg stump. Masakadza makes room and pushes it to long-on for a single
Coventry pushes a tossed up delivery to long-on for a single
on the middle and leg to start his spell. Coventry pushes it to the right of square-leg for a single
see's Masakadza coming down the track and pushes it a little faster as Masakadza pushes it to midwicket for a single
cut to point
lofts it high and handsome over cow-corner for a six
on the off stump. Coventry comes down the track and drives it to long-on for a single
outside the off stump. Bounces a little more than expected as Masakadza stands tall and defends
gets rapped on the pads for a delivery pitching outside leg
on the leg stump. Coventry comes down the track and looks to loft it away but gets hit on the pads and runs for a leg-bye
pushed to midwicket for a single
comes forward and defends
comes forward and pushes it to the leg side
on the middle stump. Coventry comes down the track and pushes it to the right of midwicket for a single
on the middle stump. Coventry comes down the track and pushes it to long-on for a single
Masakadza does the same as he gets a single to long-on
outside the off stump. Coventry pushes it to long-off for a single
outside the off stump. Masakadza pushes it back to the bowler
outside off. Masakadza defends on the back foot
on the middle and leg. Masakadza tries to play it on the leg side but gets an inside edge onto his pads
on the leg stump. Coventry shifting gears as he slog sweeps it to deep midwicket flatly for a six
outside off. Coventry comes forward and defends it to the off-side

outside the off stump. Coventry moves across and looks to drag it away to midwicket again but Enamul notices it early and pitches it fuller. Coventry manages a top-edge which is taken comfortably by Naeem at midwicket. Good time to get the wicket for Bangladesh
outside the off stump. Masakadza pushes it off the back foot to cover for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Mutizwa drives it back to the bowler
another left armer doing the trick for Bangladesh today. Mutizwa looks to clear the outfield without getting under the delivery and holes out to long-off. Poor cricket by Zimbabwe here
outside the off stump. Waller comes forward and defends
outside the off stump. Waller comes forward and pushes it to cover for a single
on the middle and leg as Masakadza pushes it to mid-on for a single
outside the off stump. Waller pushes it to point
dropped! Rahim fails to collect the ball when it matters as he fails to pick the outside edge and it's a chance for Waller to make it count
fuller outside off. Waller pushes it to cover for a single
pushes back to the bowler
on the middle stump and Waller pushes it to midwicket
cut to deep point as Enamul pitches it short outside off
outside the off stump. Waller defends
outside the leg stump and rapped on the pads
outside the off stump. Waller comes forward and pushes it to cover for a single
Waller rubbing it in for Shakib as he drives a fuller delivery outside the off stump to sweeper on the off-side for a boundary
pushes it to cover off the back foot
fuller outside the off stump. Waller comes down the track and defends
outside the off stump. Waller drives it to cover with some force but it is fielded
pushes it back to the bowler
beaten in flight outside the off stump
fuller on the off stump. Masakadza pushes it back to the bowler
on the leg stump. Masakadza helps it on it's way to fine-leg for three runs
on the off stump. Waller defends it back onto the pitch
outside the off stump. Waller drives it to sweeper cover for a single
sweeps from outside off for a couple
short outside off. Swatted back to the bowler
comes forward and drives down the ground to long off.
punches to mid-on, good fielding from the fielder from midwicket.
a long hop which keeps very low and Masakadza misses the pull shot, off the pad and past the keeper to the deep.
spins down the leg side, signalled a wide.
cut to the sweeper for a single.
plays forward and a thickish edge to the off side.
turns and extra bounce, it comes slowly off the track and Masakadza just blocks to the onside.
comes forward and defends to the onside.
punches it back to the bowler.
comes forward and pushes to cover for a quick single, shy at the stumps, misses.
turns it behind square leg for a single.
lovely turn and Waller plays and misses.
arm ball pushed back to the bowler.
looks to drive through the off side and misses.
cuts behind to deep backward point, coming back for the second run.
deft touch from Masakadza, played to third man and picks up couple of runs.
comes forward and pushes to mid-on.
uses his feet and plays back to the bowler.
sweeps well in the air to backward square leg fence.
comes down the wicket and then defends to cover, quick single taken, the throw goes to the wrong end (bowlers).
full toss driven to midwicket.
works it through square leg to the deep.
punches to the off side.
comes forward and plays to the sweeper on the off side, good running, comes back for the second run.
looking to drive through the off side, gets a thickish edge to the onside.
defended with a straight bat back to the bowler.
comes down the wicket and pushes to mid-on.
cuts hard to deep backward point for a single.
a thickish edge to short third man.
comes forward and defends back to the bowler.
short ball pulled in the air to deep square leg for a single.
defended to mid-on.
driven down the ground to long on.
uses his feet and drives to long on for a single.
moves back and plays through the off side to the sweeper.
drives down to long on for a single.
uses his feet and plays to mid-on for a single.
driven to long on for a single.
driven to wide long off for a single.
moves forward and drives along the ground to deep extra cover.
moves back and punches down the ground to long on.
uses his feet and drives down the ground to long off.
turns it to deep midwicket for a single.
sweeps down to fine leg fence for a boundary.
punches off the back foot and down the ground to long on.
comes forward and pushes to cover for a single.

a long hop and Masakadaza falls to a tame shot, pulls straight to Raqibul at midwicket and he trudges off slowly back to the pavilion, he could have hit that ball to any corner of the ground for a boundary.
down the leg side and played fine to the fence.
chops it hard behind point.
plays to the onside.
short ball pulled to deep midwicket.
uses his feet and drives to mid-off.
drags it a touch short  and flatter as he sees Waller coming down the track and he pushes forward and gets beaten and the ball knocks the stumps.
turns it behind square leg.
dropped,short down the leg side and Chigumbura looks pulls and gets some glove to it and Rahim looking to take the catch gets hit on the box, the physio is out and having a look at him.
down the leg side and signalled a wide.
down the track and driven back to the bowler.
cut hard behind point.
defended to the onside.
a terrible delivery way down the leg side, they go through for a run as well.
punches down the ground to long off.
another tame dismissal, tosses it up outside the off stump and Matsikenyeri cuts and gets an inside edge onto the stumps. The Zimbabwe innings is falling apart.
full-toss outside the off stump. Chigumbara drives it in the gap between cover and extra-cover for a boundary
good length delivery outside the off stump. Chigumbara pushes it back to the bowler
on the off stump. Chigumbara square drives it to deep point for a couple
on the leg stump. Chigumbara looks to play it away but is beaten
pushes to midwicket for a single
on the middle and leg. Chigumbara comes forward and pushes it to midwicket
on the middle and leg. Chigumbara pushes it to midwicket
fuller length on the off stump. Chigumbara defends it back onto the pitch
outside the off stump. Chigumbara pushes it to cover
on the off stump. Chigumbara drives it back to the bowler
on the middle and leg. Chigumbara defends it to the leg-side
on the off and middle. Chigumbara defends it back to the bowler
struck on the pads in line with the middle stump. High to be given
on the off stump. Chibhabha pushes it back to the bowler
pushes it to long-on for a single
on the leg stump. Chigumbara pushes it to square leg
on the middle and leg. Chigumbara pushes it to mid-on
pushes to deep midwicket and runs across for a couple
fuller on the middle stump. Pushed back to the bowler
pushed to midwicket
pushed back to the bowler
turned wide of the midwicket fielder for a single
pushed back to the bowler
outside the off stump. Chigumbara rocks back and pushes it back to the bowler
wide outside the off stump. Beaten in the flight
plays it off the back foot to midwicket
on the leg stump. Chibhabha comes forward and pushes it to midwicket for a quick single
struck high on the pads, in line with the middle stump. but high
on the middle and leg. Pushes it to mid-on
wide down the leg side
width outside off. Punishes it to covers for a boundary
comes down the track and swings it to deep square leg
and there's the wicket as Chibhabha falls for a needless shot as he drags one on the off stump straight into the hands of Naeem at midwicket
full on the middle stump. Cremer drives it back to the bowler
inside edges onto his pads
on the off stump. Pushes it back to the bowler
outside off. Cremer comes forward and drives it to cover
outside the off stump. Chigumbara comes forward and defends
drives it to deep point for a single
full outside off. Pushed to point
pushed back to the bowler
on the leg stump. Cremer turns it away to square-leg for a single
on the middle and leg. Chigumbara pushes it back to the bowler
outside the off stump. Cremer comes forward and defends
pushes it to point
outside the off stump. Cremer pushes it to the left of the point fielder for a single
on the middle stump. Chigumbara pushes it to midwicket
drives it to long-off for a couple
comes forward and punches it to cover
beaten outside the off stump
short outside off. Cut to deep point for a boundary
pushes it long-on for a single
on the off stump. Chigumbara pushes it to long-on for a single
on the leg stump. Cremer checks his shot to long-on for a single
outside the off stump. Chigumbara comes forward and defends
gets it to curve in to Cremer, who flashes and misses
short outside the off stump. Cremer punches it off the back foot to point
fuller on the middle stump. Cremer manages it well as he pushes it to cover point
good length outside the off stump. Cremer drives it off the back foot to cover for a single
on the leg stump. Chigumbara pushes it  back onto the pitch and does not know where the ball is. He just responds to his partners call and runs across
top-edge! Gets a top-edge on the cut shot and a good catch taken by Enamul at third man
turned to square leg.
works it through midwicket to the deep.
moves back and across and works it forward of square leg.
driven down the ground to long off.
a soft dismissal once again, looking to work it through the onside, closes the face off the bat and the ball lobs up to Mahmudullah at short midwicket.
comes forward and pushes back to the bowler.
a beamer from Nazmul Hossain, signalled a noball.
full and straight from Nazmul, Chigumbura plays all around it and the ball takes the pad and the stumps are shattered.

inn2.comm: full length delivery outside the off stump. Tamim comes forward and creams the drive to the cover fielder
oversteps and bowls one outside off. Gets an outside edge to third man for a couple
Free- Hit time! Tamim winds and smashes a full-toss over the infield for a superb boundary
outside the off stump and left alone
short outside the off stump. Tamim opens the face of the bat at the last moment and runs it down to third man for a single
short outside the off stump. Junaid comes forward pre-determinedly and punches it to cover, where the fielder dives across to prevent at least a couple
good length delivery on the middle and leg. Junaid comes well forward and defends it back solidly onto the pitch
outside the off stump. Tamim comes forward and punches it to cover
outside the off stump and left alone by Tamim
on the middle stump and coming back in. Tamim gets onto the back foot and pushes it to midwicket for a single
Chigumbara gifts a fuller delivery on the pads and Junaid is quick to pounce on it as he whips it away past the diving fielder at midwicket for a boundary
outside the off stump and left alone by Junaid

short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. Only good fielding effort by Cremer at backward point prevents a boundary. Junaid had played a superb square drive there. He allowed the ball to come to him
short outside the off stump. Tamim rocks back and pulls it straight to the fielder at midwicket
drives a full-toss outside the off stump, straight to the fielder at cover
pushes it tot midwicket for a single
good length delivery on the leg stump. Junaid turns it away to fine-leg for a single
Tamim should be careful as he does not get enough wood on the short ball and ends up bottom edging the shot
good length delivery on the off stump and moving away a touch. Tamim gets his bat forward in defense and gets an outside edge to third man for a single
good length delivery on the middle stump. Tamim lunges forward and pushes it away to fine-leg for a couple
Chigumbara over-compensates by pitching it full on his pads. Tamim has to just pick the gap, which he does by whipping away to deep square leg for a boundary
full-toss outside the off stump. Tamim comes forward and drives it straight to mid-off
pushes it to mid-off again
good length delivery outside the off stump. Tamim comes forward and drives it to mid-off
short on the middle and leg. Tamim comes forward and turns it away to midwicket for a single
short ball outside the off stump. Tamim does not time the pull shot and gets a bottom edge to midwicket
good length delivery outside the off stump. Makes it come into him. Tamim picks the length well and comes onto the front foot and punches it to extra-cover
ducks under the short ball comfortably
short ball on leg stump and slower one too as Tamim turns it away to short fine-leg for a single

first blood for Zimbabwe as Junaid fails to read the pace on the delivery and ends up top-edging a short delivery straight into the hands of Chibhabha at midwicket. Needless shot at this point of time
on the middle stump and fuller in length. Ashraful comes forward and pushes it to midwicket
width offered outside the off stump. Tamim comes forward and drives it through covers for a boundary
half-volley on the off stump. Tamim belts this straight back past the bowler and he is looking very very good today
wide down the leg side
good length delivery outside the off stump. Tamim gets right behind the line of the delivery and defends
on the off stump and fuller in length. Tamim swings across the line and gets a boundary as the fielders at midwicket and mid-on can't do a thing
outside the off stump. Tamim comes forward and defends
on the off stump. Tamim plays it with soft hands to midwicket for a single
outside the off stump. Must have  hit a crack on the pitch as it does not bounce at all and Tamim gets an outside edge to third man for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Ashraful drives it back to the bowler
on the leg stump. Ashraful forces it away to deep midwicket for a single
fuller length delivery outside the off stump. Tamim pushes it to mid-off and immediately shouts no
outside the off stump and short in length. Tamim ducks comfortably under it
short on the middle and leg. Tamim looks to pull it away but is beaten by the pace and bounce. He looks puzzled as to how he could miss the short ball. He has not been good on the pull shots today
fuller outside the off stump. Ashraful comes forward and pushes it to cover
outside the off stump and cutting away across him. Ashraful opens the face of the bat at the last moment and pushes it to backward point
outside the off stump and short in length. Ashraful cuts but can't clear the fielder at point
full length delivery outside the off stump. Ashraful comes forward and defends
good length delivery outside the off stump. Ashraful drives it to short-cover
on the leg stump. Ashraful turns it away to fine-leg for a couple
width offered outside the off stump. Tamim stands tall and drives it with full flourish of the bat through cover for a boundary
outside the off stump. Tamim drives it off the back foot to third man for a single
short outside the off stump.Ashraful flays it to third man and a diving Coventry can't save the boundary
fuller on the middle stump. Ashraful pushes it to midwicket
outside the off stump. Ashraful comes forward and defends
fuller length delivery outside the off stump. Ashraful stays back in the crease and defends it back to the bowler
outside the off stump to begin with as Tamim comes forward and defends
on the middle stump. Tamim stands tall and pushes it to mid-on for a single
on the middle stump. Ashraful is shaping to loft it away but checks his shot at the last moment as he defends
on the middle and leg. Ashraful defends yet again
on the middle stump. Ashraful realises it's nearing the evening break as he defends it back to the bowler
pushed back to the bowler
pushed to the off side.
short ball pulled well behind square leg to the deep for a single.
keeps low and Ashraful defends to the onside.
bouncer and Ashraful takes his eye off the ball and takes a hit on the shoulder and then onto his helmet.
mistimes the drive to the off side.
tucks it around the corner to long leg for a single.
back of a length delivery defended to the off side.
good length delivery and Ashraful comes forward and defends to the off side.
lovely shot from Ashraful, wonderful timing, punches on the front foot behind point and to the fence for a boundary.
tucks it to short midwicket.
defended to the off side, Chibhabha oversteps.
swings it past the midwicket fielder to the fence for a boundary.
nurdles it around the corner to fine leg for a single.
turn and bounce and hits Ashraful's bat on the top.
spins down the leg side, signalled a wide.
spins away as Ashraful plays forward, gets beaten.
defended to the onside.
defended to the onside.
comes forward and defends to the off side. Ashraful is watchful.
defended on the track.
tucks it forward of square leg to the deep for a single.
good length delivery defended to mid-on.
plays it off his hips to deep square leg for a single.
off the pad to the onside.
pushes to mid-on on the front foot.
down the leg side and signalled a wide.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man for a single.
comes forward and defends down the track with a straight bat.
turns it to square leg for a single.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
defended to short midwicket.
bat and pad, the ball lobs up on the onside.
cheeky stuff, reverse sweeps to short fine for no run.
short ball and Tamim goes for the pull and misses, takes it on the shoulder.
moves forward and pushes to extra cover.
clips it off his hips to deep midwicket for a single.
plays with an angled bat to point.
tucks it to square leg and looking for a single, sent back.
works it to the onside.
works it behind square leg and Ashraful calls for a tight single.
defended to the off side to short cover.
down the leg side and off the pad to short fine leg.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long on for a single.
tossed up wide and spins further away, Ashraful initially looks to play but then withdraws his bat.
driven down the ground to long off for a single.
down the leg side and tucked to fine leg for a single.
turned away to deep square leg for a single.
dabs it down to third man to pick up a single.
short ball pulled well behind square leg to the fence for a boundary, brings up his 50, well played.
looking to drive on the up, gets a thickish edge to mid-on.
defended with an angled bat to point
pushes to the fielder at midwicket.
flighted delivery and Tamim to the pitch off the ball lofts it high over the bowler to long on fence for a boundary.
sweeps to short fine leg.
defended with an angled bat to backward point.
pushes down the track.
a thickish edge to the onside as he looks to drive.
plays to cover.
cuts hard but straight to the fielder behind point.
lovely delivery spins away to beat the outside edge as Ashraful follows the ball.
pitches outside the leg stump, worked to the onside.
defended to the onside.
comes forward and defends with an angled bat to point.
outside the off stump. Tamim pushes it to long-off for a single
on the middle stump. Ashraful makes room and plays it inside out to sweeper cover for a single
on the middle and leg. Tamim comes down the track and pushes it to long-on for  a single
arm-ball on the middle stump. Ashraful plays it with soft hands to cover
outside the off stump. Ashraful comes down the track and pushes it to long-off for a single
on the middle stump. Tamim pushes it to long-on to retain the strike
on the leg stump.Tamim plays it with the turn to short fine-leg
finally some intent as Tamim comes down the track and lofts it over long-on for a huge six
on the leg stump, Tamim slogs it to deep midwicket for a single
comes forward and defends
pushes back to the bowler
cuts it late to third man
on the middle stump. Ashraful makes room and cuts it late to third man
short outside the off stump. Tamim rocks back and cuts it past the cover fielder for a boundary
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
short outside the off stump. Tamim goes through the cover region for a boundary
short on the off stump. Tamim cuts it to deep point for a single
full on the off stump. Ashraful makes room and goes inside out to sweeper cover for a boundary
on the middle and leg. Tamim comes down the track and lofts it with some power as the ball flies away over the long-on fence for a six
looks to paddle it away and is beaten
Tamim comes down the track and is looking to loft it away on the off-side this time. Cremer notices this and slips it wide. Tamim misses and Taylor is quick to remove the bails
outside the off stump and Raqibul presents a straight bat
on the middle stump. Raqibul defends it back onto the pitch with a straight bat
outside the off stump. Raqibul drives it back to the bowler
cut to deep point for a single
and that's a slap on my face as Raqibul comes down the track and lofts it over midwicket for a six
outside the off stump. Raqibul comes forward and defends
on the off stump. Raqibul pushes it to long-on for a single
turn from leg stump. Ashraful stays rooted to the crease and defends
on the off and middle. Ashraful defends it back onto the pitch
on the leg stump. Raqibul turns it away to short fine-leg for a single
on the leg stump. Ashraful comes forward and defends it on the leg side
on the middle stump. Ashraful pushes it to cover for a single
on the off stump as Raqibul looks to defend it and is beaten by the turn
on the middle stump. Raqibul pushes it to long-on for a single
on the middle and leg. Ashraful tucks it to fine-leg for a single
short outside the off stump. Ashraful cuts it late to third man for a single
and that's a superb leave by Raqibul as he picks the bounce to perfection and decides that there is nothing that he can do with it but leave
short on the middle and leg. Raqibul ducks under it
full-toss on the middle and leg as Raqibul flicks it past mid-on for a boundary. This shot was against the script
normal order restored as Raqibul lets a ball outside off pass to the keeper
on the leg stump. Raqibul pushes it to midwicket for a single
outside the off stump. Raqibul gets an outside edge to first slip and takes off but is sensible and quick enough to get back to the crease
pushed to sweeper cover for a single
what a ball! Pitched on the middle and beats the outstretched bat of Ashraful
outside the off stump. Ashraful pushes it to long-off for a single
googly on the middle stump. Raqibul picks it and defends
on the middle stump and fuller in length. Raqibul presents a dead bat
on the leg stump. Ashraful pushes it to long-on for  a single
fuller delivery on the leg stump. Raqibul pushes it to midwicket for a single
full-toss on the middle stump. Ashraful drives it to long-off for a single
on the middle stump. Raqibul pushes it to long-on for a single
comes forward and defends
wide down the leg side
looks to cut it away and is beaten by the turn
outside the off stump. Raqibul defends it with a straight bat
on the leg stump. Raqibul whips it to square leg for a single
on the leg and middle. Ashraful defends it to the leg side
outside the off stump. Ashraful plays it inside out to sweeper cover for a couple
on the middle stump. Ashraful defends
outside the off stump. Ashraful cuts it late to third man for a couple
spins in, plays and gets an inside edge.
moves back and punches down the ground to long on.
down the track and goes big and over the midwicket fence for maximum, good strike that.
a deft touch to short third man for a single.
works it behind square leg for a single.
cuts to the sweeper on the off side to bring up his 50, raises his bat to the crowd and the dressing room, well played Ashraful.
plays and misses, was looking to give room and glide it down.
short ball and pulled well to midwicket fence for a boundary.
once again swings it high in the air and one bounce to midwicket fence.
makes room and plays inside-out high in the air to extra cover fence, one bounce for a boundary.
turns it behind square leg.
a deft touch to short third man for a single.
makes room and looks to cut through the off side, gets an inside edge onto the stumps, a terrible shot from Ashraful.
defends to the off side.
pushes to mid-off.
pushes down the ground to long off for a single.
works to the onside.
moves back and turns it behind square leg.
back of a length delivery, plays and misses.
full delivery and Mahmudullah drives wide of the diving fielder at mid-on for a boundary.
mistimes the drive back to the bowler.
short ball and Mahmudullah looking for the big shot on the onside, gets an inside edge onto the pads and to the off side.
full delivery driven along the ground straight to extra cover.
a bouncer which keeps low and down the leg side, ducks under it.
works it forward of square leg for a single.
turns it to square leg, this time straight to the fielder.
comes forward with bat and pad together, defends down the track.
plays it behind square leg.
comes forward and defends back to the bowler.
moves forward and drives down the ground to wide long off for a single.
dabs it behind point and Raqibul takes off for a single from the non-strikers end, sent back.
turns it to the onside to short midwicket.
full toss played to the left of extra cover, direct hit would have been close.
short ball and pulled in the air to deep midwicket and Chibhabha running in from the deep takes the catch.
short ball left alone through to the keeper.
slower delivery and Mahmudullah too early into the shot, lobs it up in the air to mid-off and Masakadza moves forward and takes the catch inches off the ground.
good length delivery outside the off stump, left alone.
good ball from Chibhabha as Rahim looked to work it through the onside, lucky Rahim got an inside edge.
defended with an angled bat to point.
moves forward and defends, bat and then foot to the off side.
worked to the onside.
lovely shot from Rahim, width outside the off stump and he cuts well to the point boundary.
full delivery driven back to the bowler.
short and down the leg side, signalled a wide.
stands in the crease and punches to cover.
cut behind point.
left alone through to the keeper.
defends with an angled bat to backward point.
moves back and plays to the onside.
defended on the front foot to the off side.
moves back and punches to midwicket.
driven to mid-on.
defended to the onside.
moves back and cuts to cover.
off the thigh pad and behind square leg.
pushes to the onside to midwicket.
gets behind the delivery and defends to mid-on.
works it through forward of square leg to the deep and picks up couple of runs.
mistimes the drive to mid-on.
full delivery outside the off stump, goes for the big shot and gets a thickish outside edge high in the air and down to third man.
on the leg stump. Shakib turns it away to square leg for a single
and Bangladesh lose yet another wicket as Rahim thrusts his pad in front and the top-spinner thuds into the pads as he is plumb in front
outside the off stump. Naeem comes forward and defends it to point
no bowling heroics as Naeem picks a short ball on the leg stump and smashes it past the diving deep square leg fielder for a boundary
